sentences.sContent: The conservation of tropical forests is of crucial importance .
sentences.sCn: 保护热带雨林至关重要。

sentences.sContent: ...which not only serves as crucial bridge to build trust and connection between two generations but also exerts a profound and subtle influence toward to children’s personal growth...
...is the crucial ingredient in all economic progress--higher growth for nations...

...Campus plays a crucial role in educating the young generation and the consciousness of “green campus” will definitely produce a profound effect on students’ various environmental protection activities after their graduation...

exam.question: Improved consumer confidence is ________ to an economic recovery.

answer.explain: 句意： 增强消费者的信心对经济复苏有决定性意义。subordinate： 下级的， 附属的； cumulative： 积累的； satisfactory： 令人满意的。

synos.tran: 重要的；决定性的；定局的；决断的

remMethod.val: cruc(十字形， 交叉) ＋ ial(…的) → 十字路口 → 至关重要的

trans.tranOther: something that is crucial is extremely important, because everything else depends on it
